scripts.deploy: rimraf ./.expo && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./.scripts && bash publish.sh production
scripts.build:a:beta: cross-env NODE_ENV=beta node ./.scripts --addVersionCode=true && expo build:android --release-channel beta
scripts.build:a: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./.scripts --addVersionCode=true  && expo build:android --release-channel production -t app-bundle
scripts.build:i: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./.scripts && expo build:ios --release-channel production
